lead_paragraph: The executive, Aaron Slater, was president of content and advertising sales. A lawyer for the plaintiff said the lawsuit would continue.

headline.main: AT&T Fires Executive Named in Race Discrimination Lawsuit
headline.print_headline: AT&T Fires Executive Named in Race Discrimination Lawsuit

snippet: The executive, Aaron Slater, was president of content and advertising sales. A lawyer for the plaintiff said the lawsuit would continue.
